lead_paragraph: BILLANTI--Prudence M.,on March 1, 2016 of Westbury at age 90. Beloved sister of the late John and Joseph. Cherished aunt of Rosemarie (Joseph) Moskie and Andrew Spitaleri. Cherished aunt of Frank, Kristin and Frank Jr. Visiting Thursday 2-5 and 7-9pm at Krauss Funeral Home, Inc., 1097 Hempstead Tpke Franklin Square. Mass of Christian burial Friday 10:30am, St. Joseph's Roman Catholic Church Garden City. lnterment St. Charles Cemetery. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BILLANTI, PRUDENCE M.
